content: I cannot predict the future. however, it is likely that technology will continue to play a significant role in shaping the future of global tourism. new technology innovations, such as virtual reality, mobile applications, and artificial intelligence, will likely have a significant impact on the tourist experience. for example, virtual reality tours could allow visitors to "visit" tourist destinations without physically traveling there, while ai-powered chatbots could provide personalized recommendations and assistance to tourists. additionally, advancements in sustainable technologies, such as carbon-neutral flights and eco-friendly accommodations, could lead to a more sustainable tourism industry.
